text: Depending on the template you're using, you might be able to upload 1x, 2x, and 3x versions of all the images... and each of those will be pulled and loaded depending on the device type accessing your website.
I was told that 3x is for iPad and higher res displays, 2x is for mobile and Macs, and 1x is for PC and old Macs.
if you got some time, you should watch the two talks starting at the 4:05:11 timestamp here:  <https://youtu.be/VpArzDy5ny4?t=14711>
